import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useGlobalContext} from "../../context/context"; import balanceImg from '../../assets/balance.svg'; import stakeImg from '../../assets/stake.png'; const Stats = () => { const { playerData } = useGlobalContext(); const [serviceCompleted, setServiceCompleted] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { let newServiceCompleted = Math.floor(((Date.now() - playerData.player.serviceTimestamp) / playerData.player.timeForService) * 100); setServiceCompleted(newServiceCompleted); }, [playerData]); return ( <>
{playerData.player.balance}$

Service {playerData.player.typeOfService}

{playerData.player.amountOfAvailableService}

+1
{`${serviceCompleted}%`}

Upgrade

0) ? 'upgrade-container-green' : 'upgrade-container-red'}`}> {`${playerData.player.amountOfOtherService1}`} × {`${playerData.player.typeOfOtherService1}`}
+
0) ? 'upgrade-container-green' : 'upgrade-container-red'}`}> {`${playerData.player.amountOfOtherService2}`} × {`${playerData.player.typeOfOtherService2}`}
{`${playerData.player.typeOfOtherService1}`} + {`${playerData.player.typeOfOtherService2}`} = ⇩ 5s
{playerData.player.stake}$
) }; export default Stats
